query.check: SELECT isysgui_catg__id FROM isysgui_catg WHERE isysgui_catg__const = 'C__CATG__CLUSTER_SHARED_STORAGE'
SELECT isysgui_cats__id FROM isysgui_cats WHERE isysgui_cats__const = 'C__CATS__CHASSIS_VIEW'
SELECT isys_widgets__id FROM isys_widgets WHERE isys_widgets__const = 'C__WIDGET__STATS'
SELECT isys_module__id FROM isys_module WHERE isys_module__const = 'C__MODULE__QCW'
